official_title: A bill entitled: "Office Products User Protection Act".

summary.text: Office Products User Protection Act - Permits a dealer to sue a supplier for damages in Federal district court for failure to provide parts, supplies, and technical information for products sold under a dealer agreement for the longer of five years from installation or the life of any of the existing customer maintenance agreements. Requires: (1) manufacturers of office products to make parts and supplies available to dealers for five years; and (2) suits to be brought within three years. States that this Act shall not be construed to modify any provision of the antitrust laws or to supersede any State law which provides additional or stronger standards than those in this Act.

titles.title: A bill entitled: "Office Products User Protection Act".
